hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that ##the Graveyard## has #3# major items.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #fairy outside Hyrule Castle# holds #a Purple Rupee#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the way of the hero.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the way of the hero.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Compass Chest

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #Zelda's Lullaby#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that plundering #the Water Temple# is a foolish choice.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that ##the Death Mountain Crater## has #1# major item.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the path to #the Key#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Water Trial Left Chest

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: Expired Spoiler Log? Don't worry! The OoTR Discord staff can help you out.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Red Rupee#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #like-like in Ganon's Shadow Trial# guards #a Deku Shield#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Shadow Trial Golden Gauntlets Chest

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #a Goron Tunic# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Fountain# is a foolish choice.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path to #Bongo Bongo#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that a #storm in the valley# reveals the #Royal Family's Tomb#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Green Rupee# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo's Fortress# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the path of time.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Bomb Flower Platform Chest

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #a Strength Upgrade# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.
hinted_locations: KF GS Know It All House

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Gerudo Training Ground#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Blue Rupee#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #a Heart Container# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: It would be a shame if something... unfortunate... were to happen to you.^Have you considered saving lately?
